thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Noble Energy Finalizes Strategic Pipeline Agreement To Move Permian Crude Oil To Corpus Christi

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Noble Energy Finalizes Strategic Pipeline Agreement To Move Permian Crude Oil To Corpus Christi
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Noble Energy Inc:
* NOBLE ENERGY FINALIZES STRATEGIC PIPELINE AGREEMENT TO MOVE PERMIAN CRUDE OIL TO CORPUS CHRISTI
* NOBLE ENERGY - FINALIZED AGREEMENT WITH EPIC PIPELINE LP TO TRANSPORT CRUDE OIL FROM COâ€™S DELAWARE BASIN ACREAGE POSITION TO CORPUS CHRISTI, TEXAS
* NOBLE ENERGY INC - SECURED FIRM CAPACITY FOR 100 THOUSAND BARRELS OF OIL PER DAY (MBBL/D) FOR A 10-YEAR PERIOD BEGINNING AT PIPELINE START-UP
* NOBLE ENERGY INC - HAS SECURED OPTIONS TO ACQUIRE UP TO 30 PERCENT OWNERSHIP IN EPIC CRUDE PIPELINE
* NOBLE ENERGY INC - SECURED OPTIONS TO ACQUIRE UP TO 15 PERCENT OWNERSHIP IN EPIC NGL PIPELINE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
